specialRules.name: Aura of Death (4)
specialRules.description: At the start of an Enemy Regiment's "Draw Command Card" step, if it is in contact with one or more Enemy Regiment with this Special Rule, it suffers 4 Hits.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value multiplied by the Regiment's number of Stands. The Barrage has the Armor Piercing (1) special rule.

specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +3 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule is the Target of a Priest (X)'s Spellcasting Action, one failed Spellcasting die is converted to a success.

specialRules.name: Iron Discipline
specialRules.description: When this Regiment is Engaged or suffers Wounds from the Sides or Rear, it does not lose the Support (X) Special Rule and does not Re-Roll successful Morale Tests.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Stands contribute 2 Supporting Attacks during a Clash Action instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule is the Target of a Priest (X)'s Spellcasting Action, one failed Spellcasting die is converted to a success.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: A Regiment with this Special Rule ignores the effects of the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 3 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Fiend Hunter
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule may Re-Roll all failed Hit Rolls against Monster and Brute Regiments.

specialRules.name: Hardened (2)
specialRules.description: When this Regiment makes a Defense Roll, reduce any Cleave (X), Brutal Impact (X) or Armor Piercing (X) Special Rule by 2 when resolving that Defense Roll.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Fearsome
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments in contact with this Regiment must roll a D6 before being able to perform a Combat Rally or Combat Reform Action.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)

specialRules.description: This Regiment does not affect Friendly and Enemy Reinforcement Lines.

drawEvents.name: Flux-Powered
drawEvents.description: Until the end of the Round, choose one of the following bonuses for this Regiment to receive: +2 Clash Characteristic or +2 Attacks Characteristic.

specialRules.name: Aura of Death (4)
specialRules.description: At the start of an Enemy Regiment's "Draw Command Card" step, if it is in contact with one or more Enemy Regiment with this Special Rule, it suffers 4 Hits.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

drawEvents.name: Fires of the Descent
drawEvents.description: Target Friendly Regiment within 8" gains the Relentless Blows Special Rule until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (14", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value multiplied by the Regiment's number of Stands. The Barrage has the Armor Piercing (1) special rule.

specialRules.name: Bombardment
specialRules.description: This Regiment does not add +1 to its Volley Characteristic as a result of the Aimed Shot Special Rule. Instead it gains the Barrage (+1) Special Rule and adds +2" to its Barrage distance.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 2 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Impact (4)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 4.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1 for the purposes of making Morale Tests against Wounds taken from that Regiment.

specialRules.name: Fearsome
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments in contact with this Regiment must roll a D6 before being able to perform a Combat Rally or Combat Reform Action.

specialRules.name: Unstable Alloys
specialRules.description: When an Enemy Regiment selects this Regiment as a Target of a Volley Action this Regiment counts as having the Hardened (2) Special Rule until the end of that Action. In addition, when an Enemy Spellcaster selects this Regiment as a Target of a Spell, the Spell requires 2 more successes in order to be successfully cast.

drawEvents.name: Magnetic Conduit
drawEvents.description: This Regiment may immediately spend up to 3 Elemental Potency Markers. For each Elemental Potency Marker spent, this Regiment adds +1 to its Attacks Characteristic and counts as one additional Stand for the purposes of Seizing Objective Markers until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 2 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Relentless Blows
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, each Hit Roll of "1" causes an additional automatic Hit on the Target.

specialRules.name: Impact (6)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 6.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (2)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 2 for the purposes of making Morale Tests against Wounds taken from that Regiment.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Brutal Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule inflicts Impact Attacks, those Impact Attacks reduce the Target Enemy Regiment's Defense by 2 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Impact Attacks.

specialRules.name: Aghm is Eternal
specialRules.description: Friendly Character and Command Stands within 8" of this Regiment count as if they had the Flurry Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Barrage (10) (16", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value. The Barrage has the Armor Piercing (1) special rule.

specialRules.name: Impact (5)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 5.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1 for the purposes of making Morale Tests against Wounds taken from that Regiment.

drawEvents.name: Overcharge
drawEvents.description: The Regiment places an Overcharge Marker besides its Stand(s). When the Regiment performs a Volley Action, the Regiment may discard any number of Overcharge Markers. For each Marker discarded this way, the Regiment gains the Barrage (+2) and Armor Piercing (+1) Special Rules until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Priest (6)
specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. The 6 value is this Stand's Magic Level.

specialRules.name: Barrage (5) (16")
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value.

specialRules.name: Wizard (7)
specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. The 7 value is this Stand's Magic Level.

specialRules.name: Barrage (5) (18")
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value.

specialRules.name: Wizard (7)
specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. The 7 value is this Stand's Magic Level.

specialRules.name: Indifferent Towards Life
specialRules.description: This Character Stand cannot be affected by Enemy Interference. Furthermore, the Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached does not suffer the negative effects of refusing a Duel. Finally, the Character Stand does not have a Resolve Characteristic and is always considered to have passed any Morale or Resolve Characteristic Test.

specialRules.name: Critical Field
specialRules.description: When this Character Stand chooses the Regiment they are currently attached to or an Enemy Regiment they are currently Engaged with as the Target of a Spell during a Spellcasting Action, the Spell is automatically successfully resolved as if it had scored the amount of successes required.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Aghm to be Gained!
specialRules.description: A Hold Thanes Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached to gains the Flank Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 2 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Priest (6)
specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. The 6 value is this Stand's Magic Level.

specialRules.name: Forward Force
specialRules.description: This Character Stand may be attached to an Infantry Regiment even though it is a Brute Character Stand. Furthermore, the Lost Ancestor's Size is ignored for the purposes of Line of Sight.
